content: Create a list of 20 words that end with 'tion'.

1. Information
2. Education
3. Application
4. Celebration
5. Creation
6. Destination
7. Explanation
8. Imagination
9. Innovation
10. Investigation
11. Motivation
12. Operation
13. Participation
14. Population
15. Relation
16. Situation
17. Solution
18. Transportation
19. Vacation
20. Communication
